Package catchgame

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUserDAO
    This interface states which methods the DAO is to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Catch
    This class is used to start a game of 'Catch!'.
    CatchServer
    This class Handles requests from clients for logging in, making new accounts and extracting SeaCreatures from the Ocean.
    Codes
    Constant values that represent requests and responses
    Constants
    Constants for initial used throughout program.
    DatabaseManipulator  
    FishingActivity
    This is responsible for sending info to the server about the ClientSubOcean conditions, receiving SeaCreature packets, adding them to the screen, and providing action events for when a seaCreature is caught.
    FrequencyHistogram  
    GameControl
    This class is a client that lets users start FishingActivities, and controls the flow of the game.
    Ocean
    This class generates, "gives away", and regenerates SeaCreatures.
    Packets  
    Packets.ClientSubOceanSeaCreatureStatePacket  
    Packets.LoginPacket  
    Packets.NewUserPacket  
    Packets.RequestPacket  
    Packets.ResultPacket  
    Packets.SeaCreaturesPacket  
    Player  
    UserDAO
